entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
